page_title: "autoglue Provider"
description: |-
  
---

# autoglue Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `org_id` (String) Organization UUID used for X-Org-ID header.

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) User API key (X-API-KEY).
- `base_url` (String) Base URL for the Autoglue API (default: https://autoglue.glueopshosted.com/api/v1).
- `bearer_token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token for Authorization header.
- `org_key` (String, Sensitive) Org key (X-ORG-KEY). Use together with org_secret for org-scoped auth.
- `org_secret` (String, Sensitive) Org secret (X-ORG-SECRET). Use together with org_key for org-scoped auth.

## Resources

# autoglue_annotation (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue annotation.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `key` (String) Annotation key.
- `value` (String) Annotation value.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique annotation ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_cluster Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue cluster (name, provider, region). Attachments such as domains, record sets, load balancers, bastion and node pools are managed via separate resources.
---

# autoglue_cluster (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue cluster (name, provider, region). Attachments such as domains, record sets, load balancers, bastion and node pools are managed via separate resources.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_provider` (String) Cluster provider identifier (e.g. aws, azure, gcp).
- `name` (String) Cluster name.
- `region` (String) Cluster region identifier.

### Read-Only

- `apps_load_balancer_id` (String) ID of the apps load balancer attached to this cluster, if any.
- `bastion_server_id` (String) ID of the bastion server attached to this cluster, if any.
- `captain_domain_id` (String) ID of the captain domain attached to this cluster, if any.
- `certificate_key` (String, Sensitive) Cluster certificate key generated by the control plane.
- `control_plane_fqdn` (String) Effective control-plane FQDN if both domain and record set are attached.
- `control_plane_record_set_id` (String) ID of the control plane record set attached to this cluster, if any.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp (RFC3339).
- `glueops_load_balancer_id` (String) ID of the GlueOps/control-plane load balancer attached to this cluster, if any.
- `id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last validation/provisioning error, if any.
- `random_token` (String, Sensitive) Random token generated by the control plane for this cluster.
- `status` (String) Cluster status (e.g. pre_pending, ready, failed).
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp (RFC3339).

# autoglue_cluster_apps_load_balancer (Resource)

Attaches an apps load balancer to a cluster.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `load_balancer_id` (String) Load balancer ID to attach as apps LB.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Synthetic ID, equal to cluster_id.

---

# autoglue_cluster_kubeconfig (Resource)

Manages a cluster's kubeconfig (write-only). The kubeconfig is encrypted server-side and never returned by the API.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `kubeconfig` (String, Sensitive) Kubeconfig YAML for the cluster. This value is never read back from the API; it only drives writes.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Synthetic ID, equal to cluster_id.

---

# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_credential Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue credential (for example, a cloud account credential).
---

# autoglue_credential (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue credential (for example, a cloud account credential).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `credential_provider` (String) Provider for this credential (for example: aws, gcp, azure).
- `kind` (String) Credential kind (for example: access-key, service-account).
- `name` (String) Human-readable credential name.
- `secret` (Map of String, Sensitive) Credential secret payload as a map of key/value pairs. WARNING: values are stored in Terraform state.

### Optional

- `account_id` (String) Optional cloud account ID associated with this credential.
- `region` (String) Optional cloud region associated with this credential.
- `schema_version` (Number) Schema version for this credential's secret format.
- `scope` (Map of String) Arbitrary scope metadata (key/value tags) associated with this credential.
- `scope_kind` (String) Logical scope kind for this credential (for example: "cloud").
- `scope_version` (Number) Version of the scope metadata schema.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique credential ID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_domain Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue DNS domain (backed by AWS Route 53 credentials).
---

# autoglue_domain (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue DNS domain (backed by AWS Route 53 credentials).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `credential_id` (String) Credential ID (UUID) bound to this domain. Must be an AWS Route 53 service-scoped credential.
- `domain_name` (String) DNS domain name (FQDN, lowercase, without trailing dot). Changing this requires creating a new domain.

### Optional

- `zone_id` (String) Optional zone ID for the backing Route 53 hosted zone. If omitted, the control plane may backfill this automatically.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp (RFC3339).
- `id` (String) Unique domain ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last provisioning error message, if any.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `status` (String) Provisioning status (pending, provisioning, ready, failed).
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp (RFC3339).

---

## Schema

### Required

- `role` (String) Node pool role. Must match the Autoglue API’s enum: "master" or "worker".

- `id` (String) Unique node pool ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.

# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_record_set Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages a DNS record set for an Autoglue domain.
---

# autoglue_record_set (Resource)

Manages a DNS record set for an Autoglue domain.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain_id` (String) Domain ID this record set belongs to. Changing this requires creating a new record set.
- `name` (String) Record name. May be relative to the domain (e.g. `api`) or FQDN (e.g. `api.example.com`).
- `type` (String) DNS record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, MX, NS, SRV, CAA). Validation is enforced by the API.
- `values` (List of String) Record values (e.g. IP addresses, hostnames, TXT values).

### Optional

- `ttl` (Number) TTL in seconds (1–86400). Optional; if omitted, the upstream default may apply.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp (RFC3339).
- `fingerprint` (String) Deterministic fingerprint for the desired record content.
- `id` (String) Unique record set ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last provisioning error, if any.
- `owner` (String) Owner marker for the record (e.g. `autoglue`).
- `status` (String) Provisioning status (pending, provisioning, ready, failed).
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp (RFC3339).

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_server Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue server.
---

# autoglue_server (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue server.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hostname` (String) Hostname of the server.
- `ssh_key_id` (String) SSH key ID associated with this server.
- `ssh_user` (String) SSH username used to access this server.

### Optional

- `private_ip_address` (String) Private IP address of the server.
- `public_ip_address` (String) Public IP address of the server.
- `role` (String) Logical role for the server. Typically one of `master`, `worker`, or `bastion`.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique server ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `status` (String) Server status as reported by Autoglue. One of `pending`, `provisioning`, `ready`, or `failed`.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_ssh_key Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue SSH keypair (public metadata only).
---

# autoglue_ssh_key (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue SSH keypair (public metadata only).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Human-readable SSH key name.

### Optional

- `bits` (Number) Key size in bits (RSA only; typically 2048, 3072, or 4096). Ignored for ED25519.
- `comment` (String) Optional key comment (e.g. deploy@autoglue).
- `type` (String) "rsa" (default) or "ed25519".

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `fingerprint` (String) SSH key fingerprint.
- `id` (String) Unique SSH key ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `public_key` (String) OpenSSH-formatted public key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

---
# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_taint Resource - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Manages an Autoglue taint.
---

# autoglue_taint (Resource)

Manages an Autoglue taint.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `effect` (String) Taint effect, for example `NoSchedule`, `PreferNoSchedule`, or `NoExecute`. See Autoglue / Kubernetes taint documentation for valid options.
- `key` (String) Taint key. Changing this forces a new taint to be created.

### Optional

- `value` (String) Taint value (optional).

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Unique taint ID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

## Data Sources

# autoglue_annotations (Data Source)

Lists all annotations in the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Attributes List) All annotations visible to the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--annotations))

<a id="nestedatt--annotations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `annotations`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) Annotation ID.
- `key` (String) Annotation key.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `value` (String) Annotation value.

description: |-
  Lists clusters for the current organization.
---

# autoglue_clusters (Data Source)

Lists clusters for the current organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `search` (String) Optional substring filter over cluster name (maps to `q`).

### Read-Only

- `clusters` (Attributes List) Matching clusters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--clusters))

<a id="nestedatt--clusters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `clusters`

Read-Only:

- `apps_load_balancer_id` (String) Attached apps load balancer ID, if any.
- `bastion_server_id` (String) Attached bastion server ID, if any.
- `captain_domain_id` (String) Attached captain domain ID, if any.
- `certificate_key` (String, Sensitive) Cluster certificate key.
- `cluster_provider` (String) Cluster provider.
- `control_plane_fqdn` (String) Control plane FQDN, if present.
- `control_plane_record_set_id` (String) Attached control plane record set ID, if any.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `glueops_load_balancer_id` (String) Attached GlueOps load balancer ID, if any.
- `id` (String) Cluster ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last error message.
- `name` (String) Cluster name.
- `random_token` (String, Sensitive) Random token for the cluster.
- `region` (String) Cluster region.
- `status` (String) Cluster status.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# autoglue_credential (Data Source)

Reads an Autoglue credential by ID.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Credential ID to look up.

### Read-Only

- `account_id` (String) Cloud account ID.
- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `credential_provider` (String) Credential provider.
- `kind` (String) Credential kind.
- `name` (String) Credential name.
- `region` (String) Cloud region.
- `schema_version` (Number) Schema version.
- `scope` (Map of String) Scope metadata associated with the credential.
- `scope_kind` (String) Logical scope kind.
- `scope_version` (Number) Scope version.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

description: |-
  Lists Autoglue DNS domains for the current organization.
---

# autoglue_domains (Data Source)

Lists Autoglue DNS domains for the current organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `domain_name` (String) Optional exact domain name filter (lowercase, no trailing dot).
- `search` (String) Optional substring match filter applied to domain name (maps to the `q` query parameter).
- `status` (String) Optional status filter (pending, provisioning, ready, failed).

### Read-Only

- `domains` (Attributes List) Matching domains. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--domains))

<a id="nestedatt--domains"></a>
### Nested Schema for `domains`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `credential_id` (String) Credential ID bound to this domain.
- `domain_name` (String) DNS domain name.
- `id` (String) Domain ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last provisioning error, if any.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `status` (String) Provisioning status.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `zone_id` (String) Route 53 zone ID backing this domain.

# generated by https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-plugin-docs
page_title: "autoglue_record_sets Data Source - autoglue"
subcategory: ""
description: |-
  Lists DNS record sets for an Autoglue domain.
---

# autoglue_record_sets (Data Source)

Lists DNS record sets for an Autoglue domain.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain_id` (String) Domain ID (UUID) whose records to list.

### Optional

- `name` (String) Optional name filter. May be relative or FQDN; the server normalizes to a relative name.
- `status` (String) Optional status filter (pending, provisioning, ready, failed).
- `type` (String) Optional RR type filter (A, AAAA, CNAME, TXT, MX, NS, SRV, CAA). Validation is handled by the API.

### Read-Only

- `records` (Attributes List) Matching record sets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--records))

<a id="nestedatt--records"></a>
### Nested Schema for `records`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `domain_id` (String) Owning domain ID.
- `fingerprint` (String) Fingerprint of desired state.
- `id` (String) Record set ID.
- `last_error` (String) Last provisioning error, if any.
- `name` (String) Record name (relative to domain).
- `owner` (String) Owner marker.
- `status` (String) Provisioning status.
- `ttl` (Number) TTL in seconds.
- `type` (String) Record type.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `values` (List of String) Record values.

# autoglue_servers (Data Source)

Lists all servers visible to the organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `servers` (Attributes List) All servers visible to the organization. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--servers))

<a id="nestedatt--servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `servers`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `hostname` (String) Server hostname.
- `id` (String) Server ID.
- `organization_id` (String) Owning organization UUID.
- `private_ip_address` (String) Private IP address.
- `public_ip_address` (String) Public IP address.
- `role` (String) Server role (for example `master`, `worker`, `bastion`).
- `ssh_key_id` (String) SSH key ID associated with this server.
- `ssh_user` (String) SSH username.
- `status` (String) Server status as reported by Autoglue.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.

# autoglue_ssh_key_download (Data Source)

Downloads SSH key files by ID. WARNING: this can place private key material into Terraform state.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) SSH key ID to download.

### Optional

- `part` (String) Optional part selector if supported by the API (for example: `all`, `public`, or `private`). If omitted, the server default is used.

### Read-Only

- `content` (String) File content returned by the server (format depends on API; often a ZIP or PEM).

# autoglue_taints (Data Source)

Lists taints, optionally filtered by key, value, or query string.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `key` (String) Exact taint key to filter by.
- `q` (String) Case-insensitive substring match on key.
- `value` (String) Exact taint value to filter by.

### Read-Only

- `taints` (Attributes List) All taints returned by the API. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--taints))

<a id="nestedatt--taints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `taints`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) Creation timestamp.
- `effect` (String) Taint effect.
- `id` (String) Taint ID.
- `key` (String) Taint key.
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
- `value` (String) Taint value (may be empty).
